message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a one-of-a-kind product. I believe it has the potential to greatly benefit your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $2000000.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the asking price. I would like to propose an offer of $1500000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1500000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $1750000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and potential benefits to your business.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I still feel that the product should align better within my budget. I would like to propose an offer of $1600000 for the product.

Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm starting to feel like we're getting close to the product's minimum value to me. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to see some movement from your end. I'll meet you at $1650000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. If we can't meet at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose an offer of $1625000 for the product.

Bob, I'm starting to feel like we're getting close to a deal. I'm willing to make one final concession. I'll meet you at $1675000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. If we can't meet at this price, I'll have to consider other options, including selling to another buyer.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort in negotiating. I would like to propose an offer of $1650000 for the product.

Bob, I'm not willing to go any lower than I already have. I've made concessions, and I believe the product's value is worth more than what you're offering. I'm willing to give you one last chance to meet me at $1700000. If not, I'll have to consider other options.

Alice, thank you for your offer. After careful consideration, I believe we have reached the limit of our negotiation. I am unable to meet your latest offer of $1700000. Therefore, I will proceed to purchase the product from John for $1200000.
